Class PrivKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opcfoundation.ua.transport.security.PrivKey

extends java.lang.Object
    Valid and encodeable private key. Wrapper to PrivateKey

        public void save(java.io.File file)

        Throws:

        Parameters:

      • getEncodedPrivateKey

        public byte[] getEncodedPrivateKey()

      • getPrivateKey

        public java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey getPrivateKey()

      • saveToKeyStore

        public void saveToKeyStore(Cert cert,
                  java.io.File file,
                  java.lang.String privateKeyPassword,
                  java.lang.String keyStorePassword,
                  java.lang.String keyStoreType)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.security.KeyStoreException,
                           java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                           java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                           java.security.cert.CertificateException
        Save the identity to a password protected keystore.
        Parameters:
        cert - the certificate used to chain the key
        file - the file used to store the key
        privateKeyPassword - the password to secure the private key, must not be null for JKS
        keyStorePassword - the password to the key store, must not be null
        keyStoreType - key store type, either "PKCS12" or "JKS"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be written to
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - Bouncy Castle Provider not found
        java.security.KeyStoreException - keystore failed
        java.security.cert.CertificateException - certificate problem
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - cryptographic algorithm not found
